name: 8-aloneSenyaEnding
commands: It's over now...|but at what cost?
Where's that stupid mage?|Lemme go at her!
Lilith is defeated!|It's all over now.
That's a good thing isn't it? Why the dejected look on your face?|Don't worry, after Lilith's defeat, it dispelled her control.
So...what you're saying is...|You saved me but killed Schuri?|Why...?
Why couldn't you have saved her too?!|What made you choose between the two of us?!
I...|I had to choose between my own life and yours!
You would have killed me.|Did our time spent together mean nothing to you?!
Was I supposed to just stand there and take it?!|If I died, then everything we did was for naught.
How...|How could you look at Schuri as you plunged your blade into her heart!?|I was still there.....
The last thing she saw was you, {var:MC_name}.|I was still able to see...|She saw the moment you killed her.
{var:MC_name}, I can never forgive you for what you had done.
Senya...I'm sorry but just like how you thought you were doing the right thing|I thought I was doing the right thing.|I won't regret my decisions.
Don't be sorry.|Because I know you're not.|I don't see you right now.|I'm leaving.
I get that the two of us were against you.|It's just that...|Why was I the one who survived again?.....
You know...this place doesn't suit me.|As I travelled...
The new sights has always amazed lil' me.
I've done a lot of thinking and well...|I'm going to leave this castle...|There's still a lot of things I still need to do and...
There's too many memories here.|...I've lost everything again.
Of course she can't see me the same.|After all...I killed Schuri.|And would have killed her too if it came down to it.
I wish you the best.|I'll still see you around?
What do you plan to do?
I'll be here taking care of this place.|Like you...this place holds so many memories.|I want to take care of them.
Heh...that does sound like something you would do...
I think Schuri would've appreciated that.
All those days we all spent together...|I won't forget them.

True to her word. Senya left.|However her actions differed from the words she spoke that day.|News of blonde warrior destroying bandit camps had appeared.|Perhaps it was her own way of taking from what had taken from her.|Or it was to forget what happened that fateful day.|With communications between us ceased...|I could only hope that the dreaded news of death does not come.
Ending Achieved:|To The Shackles of Our Past
source:
#bad bonds, senya lives
#speak;;this is ending 8;;;narration
music;bittersweetEpilogue
add_portrait;MC;Left
expression;MC;CloseEyes
speak;MC;...
expression;MC;HalfCloseEyes
speak;MC;It's over now...|but at what cost?
wait;500
add_portrait;PossessedSenya;Right
expression;PossessedSenya;CloseEyes
wait;250
remove_portrait;PossessedSenya
add_portrait;Senya;Right
speak;Senya;Ugh...
expression;Senya;CloseEyes
expression;MC;OpenEyes
speak;MC;...Senya?|Senya?!
expression;Senya;Smile
bop_portrait;Senya
speak;Senya;I'm-|I'm free!
mirror_portrait;Senya
mirror_portrait;Senya
speak;Senya;Where's that stupid mage?|Lemme go at her!
speak;MC;Lilith is defeated!|It's all over now.
expression;MC;HalfCloseEyes
speak;MC;It's all over...
speak;Senya;That's a good thing isn't it? Why the dejected look on your face?|Don't worry, after Lilith's defeat, it dispelled her control.
mirror_portrait;Senya
mirror_portrait;Senya
expression;Senya;NoSmile
speak;Senya;Wait...where's Schuri?
speak;MC;Schuri is...
speak;Senya;So...what you're saying is...|You saved me but killed Schuri?|Why...?
move_portrait;Senya;MidRight
speak;Senya;Why couldn't you have saved her too?!|What made you choose between the two of us?!
expression;MC;OpenEyes
speak;MC;I...|I had to choose between my own life and yours!
move_portrait;Senya;MidRight
speak;Senya;You would have killed me.|Did our time spent together mean nothing to you?!
speak;MC;Was I supposed to just stand there and take it?!|If I died, then everything we did was for naught.
speak;Senya;How...|How could you look at Schuri as you plunged your blade into her heart!?|I was still there.....
wait;1000
expression;Senya;HalfCloseEyes
speak;Senya;Schuri...|Schuri was still there.....
expression;Senya;NoSmile
speak;Senya;The last thing she saw was you, {var:MC_name}.|I was still able to see...|She saw the moment you killed her.
expression;MC;CloseEyes
speak;MC;......I-
expression;MC;NoSmile
speak;Senya;{var:MC_name}, I can never forgive you for what you had done.
speak;MC;Senya...I'm sorry but just like how you thought you were doing the right thing|I thought I was doing the right thing.|I won't regret my decisions.
speak;Senya;Don't be sorry.|Because I know you're not.|I don't see you right now.|I'm leaving.
mirror_portrait;Senya
move_portrait;Senya;OffscreenRight
speak;MC;Wait!|.....
transition;close;1200
change_background;InsideCastle
transition;open;1200
multi_add_portrait;Senya;Right;MC;Left
speak;;A few days later...;;;narration_top
speak;MC;So about that day...
speak;Senya;I get that the two of us were against you.|It's just that...|Why was I the one who survived again?.....
speak;MC;......
wait;1000
speak;Senya;You know...this place doesn't suit me.|As I travelled...
expression;Senya;HalfCloseEyes
speak;Senya;The new sights has always amazed lil' me.
bop_portrait;MC
speak;MC;...You're leaving?
expression;Senya;OpenEyes
speak;Senya;I've done a lot of thinking and well...|I'm going to leave this castle...|There's still a lot of things I still need to do and...
expression;Senya;HalfCloseEyes
speak;Senya;There's too many memories here.|...I've lost everything again.
expression;MC;HalfCloseEyes
speak;MC;Right...
speak;MC;Of course she can't see me the same.|After all...I killed Schuri.|And would have killed her too if it came down to it.;;;thought_bubble
expression;MC;OpenEyes
speak;MC;I wish you the best.|I'll still see you around?
expression;Senya;Smile
speak;Senya;What do you plan to do?
speak;MC;I'll be here taking care of this place.|Like you...this place holds so many memories.|I want to take care of them.
music_fade_back;3000
speak;Senya;Heh...that does sound like something you would do...
expression;Senya;HalfCloseEyes
speak;Senya;Schuri...
expression;Senya;OpenEyes
speak;Senya;I think Schuri would've appreciated that.
expression;MC;Smile
expression;Senya;Smile
speak;MC;Then I'll see you around.
mirror_portrait;MC
move_portrait;MC;OffscreenLeft
end_skip
music;chopin_waltz_bminor
expression;Senya;HalfCloseEyes
speak;Senya;All those days we all spent together...|I won't forget them.
expression;Senya;CloseEyes
speak;Senya;Goodbye.
speak;;True to her word. Senya left.|However her actions differed from the words she spoke that day.|News of blonde warrior destroying bandit camps had appeared.|Perhaps it was her own way of taking from what had taken from her.|Or it was to forget what happened that fateful day.|With communications between us ceased...|I could only hope that the dreaded news of death does not come.;;;narration_top
